title: Lucciana Beynon's skimpy bikini top falls off as she jumps into the pool
text:
She's the daughter of tobacco tycoon Travers 'The Candyman' Beynon who dreams of becoming a world-famous swimwear model.

And on Sunday, Lucciana Beynon revealed a lot more than she bargained for after leaping into the swimming pool of her father's Candy Shop mansion.

In footage shared to Instagram, the 18-year-old jumps into the water before gasping in shock after realising her bikini top has fallen off.

Splash and flash! Travers Beynon's model daughter Lucciana suffered a major wardrobe malfunction when her bikini fell off after she jumped into a swimming pool

After realising she has suffered a wardrobe malfunction, Lucciana quickly places her hands over her chest to conceal her modesty.

In another clip shared to Instagram, the heiress can be seen dancing in a spa with her red bikini top firmly intact.

It appears the footage is several weeks old, as Lucciana is currently in London shooting a fashion campaign for online retailer ASOS.

Whoops! In footage shared to Instagram, the 18-year-old jumps into the water before gasping in shock after realising her bikini top has fallen off

Making a splash: In another clip, the heiress can be seen dancing in a spa with her red bikini top firmly intact

Lucciana has previously said she wants to become a Victoria's Secret model.

She has also set her sights on moving to the United States permenantly after graduating from high school.

She told The Gold Coast Bulletin in 2017: 'When I finish school I'll still be 17, so as soon as I turn 18, I'm going to move to America forever.'

Throwback! It appears the footage is several weeks old, as Lucciana is currently in London shooting a fashion campaign for online retailer ASOS. Pictured at a photo shoot last week

Ambitious: Lucciana has previously said she wants to become a Victoria's Secret model

'I want to become a Victoria's Secret Angel and then ultimately become a supermodel,' she added.

Lucciana, whose mother is Venezuelan former beauty queen Ninibeth Leal, added that she has a contingency plan for when her modelling career eventually ends.

'Once my time is up, because you know modelling doesn't last forever, I'll get involved in the family business and invest in property,' she said.
description: She's the daughter of tobacco tycoon Travers 'The Candyman' Beynon who dreams of becoming a world-famous swimwear model.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
